definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Introduced here is the advanced flux cored down weld technology.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了藥芯焊絲自保護下向焊技術。

sentences.english: In this case, the vias may be evaporated by lasers.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，可以通過激光焊蒸發掉了。

sentences.english: I am concerned about the bars welded across the couplers.
sentences.chinese: 我擔心的是焊在連接器上的橫欄。

sentences.english: No spalled paint exists at the plug weld and for a short distance each side of the plug welds .
sentences.chinese: 在塞焊焊縫處及塞焊周圍距離內無細漆碎屑存在。

sentences.english: No spalled paint exists at the plug weld and for a short distance each side of the plug welds .
sentences.chinese: 在塞焊焊縫處及塞焊周圍距離內無細漆碎屑存在。

sentences.english: The result shows that the method is available to model the TIG welding dynamic process.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，用該方法對TIG焊過程建模是有效的。

sentences.english: Tsui welding is easy to clean up oxides and not a bad solder Tsui.
sentences.chinese: 容易清潔焊咀上的氧化物而不會壞焊咀。

sentences.english: Dynamic recrystallization takes place in the weld nugget zone and fine grains are achieved.
sentences.chinese: 焊核區發生動態再結晶，生成細小的等軸晶粒。

sentences.english: The long neck flange should have stress-relief heat treatment after welding.
sentences.chinese: 拼接法蘭應進行焊後消除應力熱處理。

sentences.english: On the basis of introduction of friction stir welding technology, this paper presents an overview of the improved aspects of FSW in China.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了攪拌摩擦焊技術及其在中國的發展狀況。

sentences.english: I pulled the trigger on my mig and beaded a nut down low, and then another and another.
sentences.chinese: 我扣動電焊上的扳機一個又一個地往下焊螺母。

sentences.english: Using the finite element analysis software the temperature fields is analyzed in FSW process.
sentences.chinese: 對攪拌摩擦焊的溫度場進行了有限元分析。

sentences.english: Backing welding is once completed a full circle and there is only one welding joint.
sentences.chinese: 打底焊整圈一次完成，所焊焊道只有一個接頭。

sentences.english: The repair welding technology and inspecting method after welding are mainly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 重點討論了補焊工藝及焊後檢查方法。

sentences.english: The joint properties of FSW are superior to that of fusion weld.
sentences.chinese: 攪拌摩擦焊的接頭性能普遍優於熔化焊的。

definition: bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
to fasten with rivets/(coll.) to exert one's strength
